title: Creates the crime of agri-bioterrorism
summary: Creates the crime of agri-bioterrorism to protect the agricultural industry and preserve the integrity of the state's food production industry and food supply chain; establishes when a person is guilty of the crime of agri-bioterrorism; makes agri-bioterrorism a class B felony.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011

       Introduced by M. of A. CROUCH, KOLB, McKEVITT, BARCLAY, BURLING, DUPREY,
         HAWLEY, MOLINARO, OAKS, RAIA, SAYWARD -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Codes

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  penal law, in relation to creating the crime of
         agri-bioterrorism

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 490.21 to
    2  read as follows:
    3  S 490.21 CRIME OF AGRI-BIOTERRORISM.
    4    A PERSON IS GUILTY OF AGRI-BIOTERRORISM WHEN WITH INTENT TO INTIMIDATE
    5  OR COERCE A CIVILIAN POPULATION, INFLUENCE  THE  POLICY  OF  A  UNIT  OF
    6  GOVERNMENT  BY INTIMIDATION OR COERCION, OR AFFECT THE CONDUCT OF A UNIT
    7  OF GOVERNMENT, HE OR SHE:
    8    1. DESIGNS, DEVELOPS AND UTILIZES A PROCESS  OR  PROCESSES  TO  GENET-
    9  ICALLY  ALTER  PLANT  LIFE USED FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION WITH THE INTENT TO
   10  RENDER SAID PLANT LIFE  TOXIC  OR  UNSUITABLE  FOR  HUMAN  OR  LIVESTOCK
   11  CONSUMPTION;
   12    2.  INTENTIONALLY  INTRODUCES  AN  ANIMAL VIRUS, PATHOGEN, OR BACTERIA
   13  WHICH WOULD KILL LIVESTOCK OR RENDER THE BY-PRODUCTS OF  SUCH  LIVESTOCK
   14  UNUSABLE FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION;
   15    3.  INTENTIONALLY DEFILES, CORRUPTS OR ALTERS THE FOOD OR FARM PRODUCT
   16  WITH THE INTENT TO SICKEN OR KILL PERSONS OR ANIMALS; OR
   17    4. INTENTIONALLY MANUFACTURES, DESIGNS, OR ALTERS GENETIC MATERIAL  TO
   18  RESULT  IN  A  PATHOGEN,  VIRUS  OR  BACTERIA  CAPABLE  OF DISRUPTING OR
   19  DESTROYING THE FOOD OR FARM PRODUCT.
   20    AGRI-BIOTERRORISM IS A CLASS B FELONY.
   21    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04560-01-1
